GenAiFunction.description: This flow uses the contactId from the EndUserContactId retrieves the contact record for this user. If the contactRecord is null or missing and there is an EndUserContactId, always retrieve the contact record using this action. You can also use this action if you need to get updated information from the Contact Record. If EndUserContactId is blank or missing, ask the user to create an account or login.
GenAiFunction.masterLabel: AF - UAIS007 - Get Contact Information from External Id
